trends: There have been no other sightings in Saint-Sauveur
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe original and presumably unretouched picture shown here was handed over to a local Canadian UFO investigations group in 2004 but never released to the public, as far as I now. I believe that it may make a worthy addition to the MUFON database. I have no reason to doubt its authenticity, although I am not the witness in this case. This picture was taken in the fall of 2004, north of Montreal, QC, Canada, in the Laurentian region. The witness intended to capture the flock of birds in the center of the picture. She did not see the disc shaped object at the right, which seems understandable as the object appears to zoom by very quickly. Motion blur is quite apparent. I have attached the original photograph, as well as an enlargement and a digitally enhanced image (I produced the latter two pics) suggesting a 'classic' saucer shaped object, complete with a dome on top.
